rom_hindi.comment: Next time Mumbai aana toh milna Muhjko....Mumbai Sher karata hu..Video mein Aapne Marine DriveKo kya badiya shoot Kiya .Sunset screen mast tha.. koobsurat..laga..Kasie lagi aapko Hamari Mumbai.Next aana toh milna Muhjko..Aapka fans,

Marine Drive ke pehle hi kuch kharab tha, yeh kuch jaise ki traffic aur pollution. Aapke fans ko main apne video mein aapki Mumbai ki shakti aur aapki shiksha mein madad karna chahta hoon. rom_hindi.comment: Bhai I'm from panvel...real panvel station tha...tht Mean u r real
rom_hindi.counterspeech: "Namaste bhai, I'm glad you found my video helpful. I understand that you are from Panvel and that the real Panvel station is a great location. If you have any specific questions or concerns, feel free to ask and I'll do my best to assist you."
"Maine 2 numbers ka plan banana hai, 1 number ke baad hai 2 numbers ka plan banana hai. Tumhare numbers ka samajhne ki koshish karo, maine tumhare numbers ka plan banaaya hai."
